glossary.definition: Complete compensation and benefits proposal including salary, equity, benefits, start date
Candidate's response to initial offer with proposed changes to compensation or terms
Date by which candidate must accept or decline offer, after which offer is void
Process between offer acceptance and first day, including background checks, paperwork, equipment setup
Verification process for candidate's employment history, education, criminal record

business_rules: Offers must be approved by hiring manager and HR before being sent to candidate
Offer expiration is 7 calendar days from send date (configurable per offer type)
Counter-offers can be submitted up to 3 times before offer is withdrawn
Offer acceptance requires electronic signature and triggers pre-boarding workflow
Background checks must be initiated within 48 hours of offer acceptance
Pre-boarding tasks must be completed before candidate's start date
Offer packages must include: base salary, start date, job title, reporting manager
Equity grants require additional approval from finance/legal if above threshold
Offer revisions require re-approval if compensation changes by more than 10%
Offer decline triggers candidate feedback collection and pipeline update to 'Rejected'
invariants: Offer salary must be within approved salary band for job level
Offer start date cannot be in the past
Offer cannot be sent if candidate is not in 'Offer' pipeline stage
Offer acceptance requires all required fields to be completed
Background check status must be 'Cleared' before candidate can start
edge_cases: Candidate accepts offer but background check fails - offer is rescinded, candidate moved to 'Rejected', legal/HR notified
Counter-offer exceeds approved salary band - requires escalation and additional approval workflow
Offer expires while candidate is negotiating - system sends expiration warning 24 hours before, then auto-withdraws
Multiple offers sent to same candidate for different positions - system prevents conflicts, requires candidate choice
Pre-boarding task fails (e.g., equipment not available) - system alerts HR, may delay start date
Candidate accepts offer but then withdraws before start date - system updates status, triggers replacement search
Background check takes longer than expected - system allows conditional start with pending check status
Offer revision after initial acceptance - requires candidate re-acceptance and may trigger new approval workflow
compliance_requirements: Offer letters must be stored with digital signatures and timestamps (legal requirement)
Background check results must be handled per FCRA (Fair Credit Reporting Act) requirements
Salary information must comply with pay transparency laws (varies by jurisdiction)
Offer data must be retained for legal compliance (typically 7 years)
Equity grant details must be approved by finance/legal if above company threshold
Candidate personal information in offers must be encrypted and access-controlled

inputs: Offer components (salary, equity, benefits, start date)
Approval workflow participants (hiring manager, HR, finance if needed)

user_journeys: Hiring manager creates offer - system routes for approval, generates offer letter template
Candidate receives offer - reviews terms, submits counter-offer with requested changes
Offer accepted - system triggers pre-boarding workflow, initiates background check, sends welcome email
Pre-boarding tasks assigned - candidate completes paperwork, HR sets up equipment and access
Background check clears - system confirms start date, sends final onboarding instructions
Candidate starts - system transfers data to HRIS, marks recruitment process complete
acceptance_criteria_suggestions: Given offer creation, when all required fields are filled and within salary band, then offer is submitted for approval
Given offer acceptance, when candidate signs electronically, then pre-boarding workflow is triggered and background check is initiated
Given counter-offer, when within approval limits, then revised offer is generated and sent; if exceeds limits, escalation is triggered
Given offer expiration, when 7 days pass without response, then offer is auto-withdrawn and candidate is notified
Given background check failure, when results are negative, then offer is rescinded, candidate is rejected, and HR is notified
open_questions: What are the exact salary band limits per job level? How are they validated?
What is the counter-offer approval workflow? (automatic up to X%, requires approval above?)
How are background check results integrated? (third-party API? manual upload?)
What pre-boarding tasks are required? (paperwork, equipment, access setup, etc.)
How is offer data transferred to HRIS? (API integration? file export? manual?)
What happens if start date needs to be delayed after offer acceptance?
Are there different offer templates for different job types/levels?
assumptions: Offer approval workflow supports multi-level approvals (hiring manager → HR → finance if needed)
Electronic signature platform is integrated (DocuSign, HelloSign, or similar)
Background check integration with third-party provider is available
Pre-boarding tasks are configurable per job type or department
HRIS integration exists for seamless onboarding handoff
Offer expiration warnings are sent via email 24 and 48 hours before expiration
